title: Missé Beqiri attends toy event with daughter amid split speculation
text:
She has sparked split speculation from her TOWIE fiancé Jake Hall.

Yet Missé Beqiri appeared in good spirits as she attended a pre-Christmas toy event with her two-year-old daughter River at FAO Schwarz, Selfridges, London on Tuesday.

The Real Housewives Of Cheshire beauty, 33, looked chic in a white ribbed high-neck jumper teamed with a pair of high-waisted mom jeans.

Chic: Missé Beqiri appeared in good spirits as she attended a pre-Christmas toy event with her two-year-old daughter River at FAO Schwarz, Selfridges, London on Tuesday

Missé accessorised her look with a pair of white leather knee-high heeled ankle boots and hooped earrings.

The reality star styled her glossy brunette locks into a voluminous blow-dried hairdo and added a slick of minimal make-up.

While Missé's daughter River, who will turn two next week, look adorable in a festive knitted jumper dress with a white hair bow.

Glamorous: The Real Housewives Of Cheshire beauty, 33, looked chic in a white ribbed high-neck jumper teamed with a pair of high-waisted mom jeans

Star-studded: Also attending was Lara Stone who cut a casual figure in a pair of black skinny jeans and a star patterned shirt

Work it: The model, 35, styled her blonde locks into a sleek sweptback ponytail and she added just a slick of make-up

The RHOC beauty joined the likes of Lara Stone, Leah Wood and Jade Parfitt at the event which celebrated the launch of the first ever London store of the American toy shop.

It comes after Missé and Jake, who confirmed their engagement in May last year, sparked split speculation earlier this month

The former TOWIE star, 29, and Real Housewives Of Cheshire beauty, 33, have suffered a tumultuous time in their romance and it seems things are possibly off once again.

Family: Jo and Ronnie Wood's daughter Leah also attended the event with her two children - son Otis and daughter Maggie

Casual: The singer, 41, wore a pair of black leggings with a T-shirt, trainers and oversized cardigan for the toy event

Smart: Pippa Vosper looked smart in a grey tweed blazer at the toy event

So chic: Jade Parfitt looked chic in a green patterned dress with a black rainbow striped jumper over the top as she posed with daughter Tabitha

Details: The model, 41, teamed her look with a pair of white trainers and a long silver pendant necklace

The couple, who are parents to daughter River, two, no longer follow each other on social media and were last pictured together in August - 10 months after Jake was slapped with a restraining order following a row with Missé.

Far from their formerly excessive joint social media posts, Jake and Missé have been absent from one another's Instagram grids - with the former last sharing a snap of his surprise birthday on August 20, while the latter last shared a snap in May.

Last week, the stunner took to her Instagram stories to pen: 'I hope the truth will bless you as much as your act on social media'.

Happy days: It comes after Missé and Jake, who confirmed their engagement in May last year, sparked split speculation earlier this month (pictured in happier times)

In recent weeks, fans have swarmed the comments section of various posts on Missé's account with speculation over the state of their relationship.

Users penned: 'Has Jake and Misse split up?... @jakehall @missebeqiri @prevustudio such a shame you are no longer together Jake and Misse... no signs of Jake.'

MailOnline has contacted Jake and Missé's representatives for comment.

Jibe? Last week, the stunner took to her Instagram stories to pen: 'I hope the truth will bless you as much as your act on social media'

In December last year, Jake was ordered not to contact Missé for 28 days, over the Christmas period. While no details were given in relation to what sparked the order, Hall's barrister Martin Lewis told the court no physical violence had taken place.

At Westminster Magistrates' Court last month, Lewis stated that Hall agreed that a 'cooling off period' may be a good idea to 'keep the peace'.

The terms of the order, which were not read in court but were confirmed by a court official, state that Hall must not contact the model directly or indirectly and must not attend Park Walk in Chelsea for 28 days.

Their love: The couple, who are parents to daughter River, two, no longer follow each other on social media and were last pictured together in August - eight months after Jake was slapped with a restraining order following a row with Missé

District Judge Kwame Inyundo said: 'Mr Hall, you know what the order is and you understand that any breach of the order is a criminal offence which could lead to anything up to imprisonment.'

Missé, who was previously married to footballer Anders Lindegaard, soared to fame on RHOC in 2016, although after two seasons she has backed down to become a secondary cast member rather than a main housewife.

Jake and the stunner confirmed their romance in November 2016, as he finally put his seven-year relationship with TOWIE co-star Chloe Lewis behind him.

The couple then became parents, with Missé giving birth to their first child River in November 2017.

Happy days: The couple then became parents, with Missé giving birth to their first child River in November 2017

'Our new blessing River, before you were born we dreamed of you,' she penned in a heartfelt snap, announcing the birth on social media with their admirers.

'Now that you are here you have completed us. I love you more than anything and I forever will. My girl I'm so proud of you.'

It is little wonder the reality star snapped back into shape so quickly as she divulged to her fans she was back in the gym just 12 days after having her child.

Missé is already mother to son Julian with footballer ex Anders, who she divorced in August 2016 after two years of marriage.

The model had hinted children were on the cards for her, as last April, she was seen having a conversation with her former Real Housewives of Cheshire star Tanya Bardsley, where she admitted she wanted to expand her brood with boyfriend Jake.
description: The Real Housewives Of Cheshire beauty, 33, looked chic in a white ribbed high-neck jumper teamed with a pair of high-waisted mom jeans.
